Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I wanted to design a Heavy Launch Vehicle that could take a minimum of 100T into a 75km Circular orbit. So here it is!

I call her the Orion 5 HLV. Using Mechjeb, and a 50% turn shape, it can lift a total payload (including the third stage engine and fuel tank connected to the command pod) of 130 tons into a circular, 75Km orbit!

It is very stable due to intricate strut work, and has two droppable asparagus staged liquid boosters strapped to the outside. And it only has around 130 parts, so anyone could use it!

I am also planning to create a family of lifters around this design to accommodate a wide range of payloads, with this one being the flagship.

Needed mods/add ons:

KW Rocketry (here is a link to show you how to make this mod work with version 0.20 until it is officially updated, very easy: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30781-KW-Rocketry-and-v2?highlight=rocketry)

Mechjeb 2.0.8 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12384-PLUGIN-PART-0-19-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-7

And finally, the .craft file:

http://www./download/t9lp451flx2s6mb/Orion_5_HLV.craft

Enjoy, and let me know what you think!

Edited May 24, 2013 by SixthFall
